title: Ecommerce Video Editor
job_overview:
Compensation: $250–$300/month
Schedule: 10–20 hours/week (flexible, async with some deadline alignment)

About Us
We’re a U.S.-based women’s clothing brand known for heirloom-quality pieces and thoughtful design. We’re looking for a part-time video editor who can help us create simple, clean, effective video content for Meta ads and social media. No fancy transitions or cinematic flair needed — we care more about speed, flow, and clarity.

What You’ll Be Doing
Cut down longer footage from brand shoots or UGC into 15, 30, and 60-second ads
Edit clips to match our brand tone and reference examples provided
Add text overlays, light transitions, and basic graphics (if needed)
Work with existing content pillars and brief templates
Deliver 3–6 short-form videos per week for Meta ads and social use
Occasionally organize and rename content libraries for easier access

Tools We Use
CapCut or Adobe Premiere (we’re flexible)
Canva for text overlays or basic graphics
Google Drive for sharing + feedback

You Might Be a Fit If You...
Are a quick, clean editor who doesn’t overcomplicate things
Are fluent in social video formats and short-form timing
Can follow brand references and stick to simple creative briefs
Communicate well and deliver on deadline
Are comfortable editing content featuring models, clothes, and lifestyle settings
Are flexible, responsive, and happy to work async

This Role Is NOT for You If You...
Specialize in animation-heavy, effects-driven video
Need to be told what to do every step of the way
Struggle with consistency, feedback, or async communication
